monsters.legend: The Inferno King, a colossal Fire Dragon, reigns over the scorching lands with its blazing breath and searing claws. Its fiery rampage leaves nothing but ashes in its wake.
Frostreaver, the formidable Ice Giant, towers over the frozen tundras. Its icy fortress-like skin is nearly impenetrable, and it wields a massive frosty hammer with deadly precision.
The Abyssal Terror, a sinister Shadow Serpent, lurks in the depths of the underworld. Its venomous fangs and shadowy coils strike fear into the hearts of even the bravest heroes.
Stormbringer, the majestic Thunder Phoenix, soars through the stormy skies. Its electrifying feathers unleash thunderstorms and its beak can summon bolts of lightning.
Rockslide, the colossal Earth Golem, guards the ancient mountain fortresses. Its stony exterior is impervious, and it can create quakes with a single mighty stomp.
